DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_03_02: Yeah. Not everyone can afford it, least of all those suckers from Knut.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_15_03: By the way, I think they're looking for you.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_15_05: I know you're shying away from work.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_03_06: How did you... Shit. Well... Guess I'm caught.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_03_07: I... what are you going to do about it?
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_IWillTellKnut_15_0: I'll tell Knut that you're hiding here, and then he'll give me what I want.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_IWillTellKnut_03_0: No! Please! I'll do whatever you want, just don't make me go back to that goddamn bully!
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_GiveMeSomething_15: You'll have to give me a really good reason why I shouldn't.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_GiveMeSomething_03: And how would you feel if some muscle man forced you to do grueling work day after day and still screamed over your ear?
I'm guessing you wouldn't last long. I finally cracked and gave up.
Helmud may pay less than Knut, but at least he treats me with respect.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_CoolStoryBro_15_01: Your story doesn't convince me. Knut will find out everything.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_WhatsYourOffer_03_: Go back to Knut and tell him that I am dead. As proof, take this amulet. It is my family heirloom.
I never partied with it, so Knut will associate it right away.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_Really_15_01: I think you could do with a little more effort.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_Really_03_02: Take this gold. I don't have any more on me, really!
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_GiveMeThat_03_02: I knew you were a good guy. Thanks a lot.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_IWillFightYou_15_0: You'll come back in kind or I'll make you.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_IWillFightYou_03_0: Oh no, no way, I'm not going back anywhere!
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_NirkoLose_03_01: All right, well... You win, I'll get back to him... Just leave me alone, okay?
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_WantFightAgain_03_01: You looking for trouble again? I said I'm not going anywhere!
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_IWillTellKnut_Choi: I'll tell Knut you're hiding here.
DIA_Nirko_SQ101_Hello_IWillTellKnut_Give: You'll have to give me a really good reason.
